text: Abrahama a hooa a re: “Mong`a ka! A k’u etse motse ona ho ba oa khotso (polokeho), u be u sitse beng ba oona ka litholoana tse lokelang ba kholoang ho Allah le ho letsatsi la bofelo, ‘Allah U ile a arabela: “Haele ba mahana-tumelo ke tla ba lesa har’a monyaka ka nakoana, joale ebe ke ba lelekella timelong ea mollo – e leng pheletso e mpe ea leeto
